oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Property Matrices of [001]-Poled Pb(Zn(1/3)Nb(2/3))O(3)-(6-7)%PbTiO(3) Single Crystals of [110]-Length Cut: A Modified Approach
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHUKLA, R
GANDHI, P
RAJAN, KK
LIM, LC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ultrasonic transducers
growth
temperature
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we investigate the effect of error propagation by reconstructing the full property matrix of [001]-poled Pb(Zn(1/3)Nb(2/3))O(3)-(6-7)%PbTiO(3) single crystal of [110] length cut by direct measurement of s(12)(E) elastic constant instead of deducing it from the expression which is a function of s(11)(E), s(13)(E), s(33)(E), and s(12)(E). Here, s(12)(E) is obtained directly m strain gauge measurements and only expressions which are less likely to incur propagation errors are used. The efficacy of proposed expression of s(13)(E) is critically analyzed by error analysis. A more practical average value for d(31) is also used. The refined properly matrix is thus more accurate for use in the modeling of the performance of piezoelectric devices using the said crystal cut. (C) 2009
